Home.title: Let's Get You Hired.
Home.line1: SearchJobs.com is a job search advice website founded in 2020 by executive recruiter Ravi Barwad to share job search tips and tactics based on direct experience working with hundreds of job seekers, recruiting for multiple Fortune 500 firms, and reviewing thousands of resumes and profiles.
Home.line2: We aim to help you feel confident and prepared in your job search so you can land high-paying, in-demand jobs.
Home.line3: We show you what it really takes to get hired by top employers with tested strategies, templates, and more.
Home.line4: SearchJobs.com has won numerous awards and has been mentioned in Forbes, INC, Business Insider, and more.

Engg.title: Electrical Engineer
Engg.description: We require Electrical Engineer to oversee and lead the project on M&E services from conceptual stage, design development, contract documentation, authority submissions, site administration to project completion. Has a good understanding of digital technology. BIM and their added values.

Engg.title: Application Engineer
Engg.description: Responsible for meeting Application Engineering requirements for covering Enquiry Quotation process, technical selections, compliance statements, Technical submittals, Reply to comments, preparing weekly quotation reports, updating tasks in AE Actions file, enquiry handling follow-up, tracking and updating the system regularly.

Engg.title: Digital Engineering Specialist
Engg.description: We are looking for a dedicated and detail oriented Digital VDC (Virtual Design Construction) Specialist who is eager to continuously engage, can understand the changing environment of the construction and engineering industry as it taps into the digital/virtual world. Has a good understanding of digital technology, BIM and their added value.

Engg.title: Sr. Engineer
Engg.vacancy: 51-200 employees · IT Services and IT Consulting
Engg.description: Engineering Support for KBR Programs Engineering Support for KBR Programs We are looking for a dedicated and detail oriented Digital VDC (Virtual Design Construction) Specialist who is eager to continuously engage, can understand the changing environment of the construction and engineering industry as it taps into the digital/virtual world.

Engg.title: Field engineer
Engg.description: Communicate with clients to determine needs and explain complex issues. Conduct research studies on site. Manage field activities and implement engineering designs. Diagnose construction or machinery problems. Resolve malfunctions or other crises when they arise. Oversee repairs and technical improvements.

Engg.title: Design Engineer
Engg.description: Design new engineering products and processes. Craft models and drawings of products using CAD. Analyze prototype data and retest if needed. Research new product ideas and methods. Improve existing products and processes. Ensure compliance with the industry’s safety standards. Maintain accurate records. Ensure products are user- and environment-friendly.

Engg.title: Substation Engineer (Primary)
Engg.vacancy: 10,001+ employees · Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing
Engg.description: Design authority for all engineering activities for assignments on projects classified as Low and Medium engineering complexity. Support Project Manager for any technical issues. Conduct Engineering Project Reviews and report progress and cost-to-complete to Engineering- and Project Manager.

Engg.title: Electrical Engineer
Engg.description: Design, control, and implement electrical systems and products. Develop manufacturing processes according to global engineering codes and standards. Manage engineering projects and deliver them on time. Perform quality and performance analysis on new and legacy IT systems. Summarize data and report on test results.

Engg.title: Design Engineer
Engg.description: Design new engineering products and processes. Craft models and drawings of products using CAD. Analyze prototype data and retest if needed. Research new product ideas and methods. Maintain accurate records. Ensure products are user- and environment-friendly. Write detailed reports.

Engg.title: Graduate Engineering Trainee
Engg.description: Responsible for design and development of mechanical component of elevator System. Responsible for qualification of mechanical components/assemblies at mechanical laboratory and at test hoist way. Responsible to participate and prepare component/Sub system level Test Evaluation Master Plan (TEMP), prepare the Test Plan and carry out testing.

Sales.title: Service Desk
Sales.description: Opens, logs, prioritizes, assigns, and closes calls logged in the IT SD Asks the Customer End User for all relevant information concerning the call made or issue reported by the Customer End User Attempts to resolve the defined inquiries while on the telephone, to meet the agreed upon Service Level for First Call Resolution.

Sales.title: Hiring for sales officer at Nagpur
Sales.description: To achieve secondary sales as per the sales targets set on monthly/Qtrly/Annual basis. To achieve collection targets set month-on-month. To visit dealers as per the beat plan set for the day and service. To do marketing initiatives and BTL activities such as canopy activity, poster, banner amp; dangler placements etc.

Sales.title: Sales Officer
Sales.vacancy: 11-50 employees · Furniture and Home Furnishings Manufacturing
Sales.description: Handling inbound calls and emails in a professional manner. Resolving customer inquiries and requests and ensuring strong customer satisfaction. Working with various internal teams to ensure prompt and accurate order processing and delivery. Supporting the sales team key planning and operations tasks to support the overall objective of the business.

Marketing.title: Search Engine Marketing Specialist
Marketing.description: The Search Engine Marketing (SEM) Specialist will manage all paid search campaigns on Google, Yahoo and Bing, as well as other search and display marketing engines. A successful SEM Specialist will effectively manage the paid search budget and work with the SEO and Marketing team in order to maximize ROI, drive traffic, and customers.

Marketing.title: Digital Marketing Executive
Marketing.description: Co-ordinate with internal teams, agency and influencers to facilitate content for social media marketing including content calendar, videos, creative graphics, etc. Manage influencer marketing program by researching, identifying and coordinating with influencers and measuring their performance.

Marketing.title: Web Research / Lead Generation
Marketing.description: Research and qualify potential leads relevant to our business through various online and offline channels.Utilize creative methods to engage with leads to generate interest in our services. Communicate with the prospect and schedule a call between the prospect and the sales team.
